game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: In this quest, you are tasked to explore the forgotten ruins deep in the jungle and uncover the lost artifact that holds great power. Be wary of the dangers that lie ahead.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a magical amulet

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You must find the hidden entrance to the ruins. Speak with local villagers for any clues.

task.objective: Solve the puzzle at the entrance
task.description: A riddle guards the entrance. Answer it correctly to gain access.
Explore the ruins, avoiding traps and solving puzzles to reach the heart of the ancient structure.
